dct_title_s: Map showing property lines of the Midland Linseed Oil Company
dct_description_sm: Tracing of a map showing the property lines, including pier lines, of various company and personal properties, in particular Linseed Oil Company and Valvoline Oil Company.
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Plotted by courses and distances shown on survey map by F.A. Dunham June 1911
